verses.verse: Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about on the day <S%H3117><s%> that Moses <S%H4872><s%> had finished <S%H3615><s%> setting <S%H6965><s%> up the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> he anointed <S%H4886><s%> it and consecrated <S%H6942><s%> it with all <S%H3605><s%> its furnishings <S%H3627><s%> and the altar <S%H4196><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> its utensils; <S%H3627><s%> he anointed <S%H4886><s%> them and consecrated <S%H6942><s%> them also.

Then the leaders <S%H5387><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of their fathers' households, <S%H1004><s%> made <S%H7126><s%> an offering <S%H7126><s%> (they were the leaders <S%H5387><s%> of the tribes; <S%H4294><s%> they were the ones who were over <S%H5921><s%> the numbered <S%H6485><s%> men).

When they brought <S%H935><s%> their offering <S%H7133><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> covered <S%H6632><s%> carts <S%H5699><s%> and twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> oxen, <S%H1241><s%> a cart <S%H5699><s%> for [every] two <S%H8147><s%> of the leaders <S%H5387><s%> and an ox <S%H7794><s%> for each one, <S%H259><s%> then they presented <S%H7126><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>
Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Accept <S%H3947><s%> [these things] from them, that they may be used <S%H5647><s%> in the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting, <S%H4150><s%> and you shall give <S%H5414><s%> them to the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> [to] each <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to his service. <S%H5656><s%>"
So Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the carts <S%H5699><s%> and the oxen, <S%H1241><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them to the Levites. <S%H3881><s%>

Two <S%H8147><s%> carts <S%H5699><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> oxen <S%H1241><s%> he gave <S%H5414><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon, <S%H1648><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to their service, <S%H5656><s%>

and four <S%H702><s%> carts <S%H5699><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%> oxen <S%H1241><s%> he gave <S%H5414><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari, <S%H4847><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to their service, <S%H5656><s%> under the direction <S%H3027><s%> of Ithamar <S%H385><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest. <S%H3548><s%>

But he did not give <S%H5414><s%> [any] to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> theirs <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1992><s%> [was] the service <S%H5656><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> [objects, which] they carried <S%H5375><s%> on the shoulder. <S%H3802><s%>

And the leaders <S%H5387><s%> offered <S%H7126><s%> the dedication <S%H2598><s%> [offering <S%H7133><s%>] for the altar <S%H4196><s%> when <S%H3117><s%> it was anointed, <S%H4886><s%> so the leaders <S%H5387><s%> offered <S%H7126><s%> their offering before <S%H6440><s%> the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Let them present <S%H7126><s%> their offering, <S%H7133><s%> one <S%H259><s%> leader <S%H5387><s%> each <S%H259><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> for the dedication <S%H2598><s%> of the altar. <S%H4196><s%>"

Now the one who presented <S%H7126><s%> his offering <S%H7133><s%> on the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> [was] Nahshon <S%H5177><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amminadab, <S%H5992><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Judah; <S%H3063><s%>

and his offering <S%H7133><s%> [was] one <S%H259><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> dish <S%H7086><s%> whose weight [was] one hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> [shekels, <S%H8255><s%>] one <S%H259><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> bowl <S%H4219><s%> of seventy <S%H7657><s%> shekels, according to the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> of them full <S%H4392><s%> of fine <S%H5560><s%> flour <S%H5560><s%> mixed <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%> for a grain offering; <S%H4503><s%>
one <S%H259><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> pan <S%H3709><s%> of ten <S%H6235><s%> [shekels,] full <S%H4392><s%> of incense; <S%H7004><s%>

one <S%H259><s%> bull <S%H6499><s%>, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> one <S%H259><s%> ram, <S%H352><s%> one <S%H259><s%> male <S%H3532><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> one year <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> for a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering; <S%H5930><s%>
one <S%H259><s%> male <S%H8163><s%> goat <S%H5795><s%> for a sin <S%H9128><s%> offering; <S%H9128><s%>

and for the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings, <S%H8002><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> oxen, <S%H1241><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> male <S%H6260><s%> goats, <S%H6260><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> male <S%H3532><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> one year <S%H8141><s%> old. <S%H1121><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> [was] the offering <S%H7133><s%> of Nahshon <S%H5177><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amminadab. <S%H5992><s%>
